languages.text: "Хех. Кажется, у Лорд-капитана привычка — прощать непростительное... да, рыжая?"
"Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"
languages.original_text: "Хех. Кажется, у Лорд-капитана привычка — прощать непростительное... да, рыжая?"

languages.text: “哎哟，哎哟，看来舰长大人已经习惯于饶恕那些不值得饶恕的人……呃，小红毛？”
languages.original_text: "Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"

traits.locale_text: “哎哟，哎哟，看来舰长大人已经习惯于饶恕那些不值得饶恕的人……呃，小红毛？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien. À croire que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a la manie de pardonner les impardonnables... hein, la rouge ? »
languages.original_text: "Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien. À croire que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a la manie de pardonner les impardonnables... hein, la rouge ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Vaya, vaya... Parece que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene la costumbre de perdonar lo imperdonable, ¿eh, roja?».
languages.original_text: "Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"

traits.locale_text: «Vaya, vaya... Parece que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene la costumbre de perdonar lo imperdonable, ¿eh, roja?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「結構じゃない。ロード・キャプテンは許しがたいことだって許す癖があるみたい…ね、赤髪さん？」
languages.original_text: "Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"

traits.locale_text: 「結構じゃない。ロード・キャプテンは許しがたいことだって許す癖があるみたい…ね、赤髪さん？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sieh an, sieh an ... Der Lord Captain macht es sich offenbar zur Gewohnheit, das Unverzeihliche zu verzeihen ... was, Rote?"
languages.original_text: "Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"

traits.locale_text: "Sieh an, sieh an ... Der Lord Captain macht es sich offenbar zur Gewohnheit, das Unverzeihliche zu verzeihen ... was, Rote?"

languages.original_text: "Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"

languages.text: "Ha... Lord Kaptan'ın bağışlanamaz olan şeyleri bile bağışlama huyu demek Kızıl?.."
languages.original_text: "Well, well. It seems the Lord Captain has a habit of forgiving the unforgivable... eh, Red?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ın bağışlanamaz olanları bağışlama huyu var demek ha, Kızıl?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
